name: Whitworth Park
note: Open park with lots of open space and trees which semms to be great for clearing your head.

name: Manchester Museum
note: Quiet exhibit halls perfect for decompressing and thinking slowly.

name: Alan Gilbert Learning Commons (Green Booths Area)
note: Private booth seating to reset in silence or think quietly.

name: The Whitworth Art Gallery Café
note: Light-filled café overlooking the park, its a calming place to sit for a while.

name: Oxford Road Walk (tree-lined route behind University Place)
note: A short gentle walk route to reset between lectures.

name: HOME Manchester
note: A calm cultural space with soft lighting and open seating. Great for taking a quiet moment while still feeling connected to the city.
